headline: Introducing Proudflare, Cloudflare's LGBTQIA+ Group
keywords: Proudflare, LGBTQIA+, Life @ Cloudflare, Employee Resource Groups
description: With Pride month now in our collective rearview mirror for 2018, I wanted to share what some of us have been up to at Cloudflare. We're so proud that, in the last 8 months, we've formed a LGBTQIA+ Employee Resource Group (ERG) called Proudflare.
